thread.title: Posthumously award the George Cross to PC Keith Palmer
thread.title_full: Posthumously award the George Cross to PC Keith Palmer

title: Posthumously award the George Cross to PC Keith Palmer
text: by: James W This petition is for PC Keith Palmer to be awarded the highest civillian honour possible. Keith Palmer was murdered at the Palace of Westminster in a terrorist attack on the 22nd March 2017. Whilst no amount of clicking buttons or signing paper can undo the damage caused, we, the undersigned, request the PC Keith Palmer be posthumously awarded the George Cross for laying down his life in the defence of our deomcracy.
